CustomField.formula:
TEXT(YEAR( Combined_Largest_Gift_Date__c )) & "-" &
IF(MONTH(Combined_Largest_Gift_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "") & TEXT(MONTH(Combined_Largest_Gift_Date__c )) & "-"&
IF(DAY(Combined_Largest_Gift_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "") & TEXT(DAY(Combined_Largest_Gift_Date__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used on donor profile and other Conga templates.
CustomField.label: Conga - Formatted Largest Gift Date
